name: A Sage Equalling the Heavens
description:
A game by HB0SS (programming) and 7ko (art)

-------------------

Description:

Climb higher and higher Monkey! Get to 25 steps high to surpass the heavens.

But be careful, based on your actions the Heavens will try to make the next level even harder, mutating the obstacles based on your previous chosen path. Figure out their scheme and turn it against them!

------------------

Controls:
Press tab to cycle through items.

Left, right, up down to move, or to select what obstacle to interact with when using an item.

Space to use the selected item.

Use the axe on a tree to get a log.
Use a log on water to make it passable.
Use the boomfist on a wall to reduce it to rubble.
Use the grapplinghook to walk up a mountain.

When you walk on a chest, you get an item - some items have limited uses!

Refresh the page to try again.

Press space to start the game.
